text.div:
HPDocumentType

LOINC document type codes for History and Physical documents.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1
    CodeDisplay
    34117-2History and physical note
    11492-6Provider-unspecified, History and physical note
    28626-0Physician History and physical note
    34774-0Surgery History and physical note
    34115-6Medical student Hospital History and physical note
    34116-4Physician Nursing facility History and physical note
    34095-0Comprehensive history and physical note
    34096-8Nursing facility Comprehensive history and physical note
    51849-8Admission history and physical note
    47039-3Hospital Admission history and physical note
    34763-3General medicine Admission history and physical note
    34094-3Cardiology Hospital Admission history and physical note
    34138-8Targeted history and physical note

name: HPDocumentType
description: LOINC document type codes for History and Physical documents.
